label: 下国
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Fourth of the four grades of provinces (kuni); divided according to their population and importance. The inferior provinces were: Izumi-, Iga-, Shima-, Izu-, Hida-, Oki-, Awaji-, Iki-, and Tsushima-no-kuni. [和泉、伊賀、志摩、伊豆、飛騨、隠岐、淡路、壱岐、対馬国]
